etymology.interpretation: The character 矢(shǐ, 'arrow') is a pictogram representing an arrow. Its resemblance to arrows was more evident in ancient script forms.

examples.chinese: 他拉开弓(他拉開弓)，射出一支矢(射出一支矢)。
examples.pinyin: Tā lā kāi gōng, shè chū yī zhī shǐ.
examples.english: He drew his bow and released an arrow.

examples.chinese: 古代战士用矢(古代戰士用矢)，攻破敌阵(攻破敵陣)。
examples.pinyin: Gǔdài zhànshì yòng shǐ, gōng pò dí zhèn.
examples.english: Ancient warriors used arrows to breach enemy formations.
